name: Nicholas J. PALLOTTO, Appellee, v. BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS OF NORTH CLARION COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Pallotto v. Board of School Directors

parties: Nicholas J. PALLOTTO, Appellee, v. BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS OF NORTH CLARION COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of September, 1997, the appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
698 A.2d 590
Nicholas J. PALLOTTO, Appellee, v. BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS OF NORTH CLARION COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 4, 1997.
Decided Sept. 16, 1997.
